frontmatter.title: Auto-Instrumentation for Traces and Metrics with the Java agent
frontmatter.description: Learn how to get started with Java Auto-Instrumentation Agent. This package includes the instrumentation agent, instrumentations for all supported libraries and all available data exporters, providing a complete out of the box experience for tracing and metrics on AWS. The agent is preconfigured to generate trace IDs compatible with AWS X-Ray, which will also work with any other tracing system, and enables trace propagation using W3C Trace Context, B3, and X-Ray.
